title: Donald Trump-Labelled Wallet Has Over $1M of TRUMP Meme Coin
description: Issuance of the TRUMP tokens has nothing to do with Trump directly, but some are using the tokens as a speculative bet on his ongoing presidential campaign

title: Crypto miner Core Scientific resumes trading on Nasdaq after debt reduction
description: Bitcoin mining company Core Scientific is set to resume trading on the Nasdaq after successfully navigating a complex reorganization process. This development follows the company’s bankruptcy filing in 2022 and marks a significant turnaround for the Texas-based firm.  Core Scientific’s restructuring efforts have allowed it to significantly reduce its debt and position itself for future […]

title: Crypto Fear and Greed Index drops to 100-day lows
description: The Fear and Greed Index fell to its lowest levels in 100 days as Bitcoin (BTC) fell below the $40,000 mark for the second time in a week. Against the backdrop of changes to BTC and the cooling of the market…

title: Cardano’s 27 Billion ADA Whale Transactions: A Beacon of Hope Amidst Price Drops

title: Significant Sell-Off: AVAX, 1000SATS, and OP Experience Sharp Declines
description:
